p: The samples were labelled with iTRAQ Reagent-8 plex Multiplex Kit (AB Sciex U.K. Limited, Shanghai, China) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. All of the labelled samples were mixed in equal amounts. The labelled samples were then fractionated by high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) system (Thermo DINOEX Ultimate 3000 BioRS, Waltham, MA, USA) using a Durashell C18 analytical column (5 μm, 100 Å, 4.6 × 250 mm). Finally, 12 fractions were collected.
